text:
I don't blame them for the wait times or shortage of seating due to Christmas Day rush.

But yes, all 1 stars are for the indifferent (to the point of being rude) and unhelpful staff at the counter on 25th around 3pm. We ordered loads of stuff as a family, yet I had to drag my wheelchair bound 80 year old mom upstairs to use the washroom while there were 2 locked washrooms downstairs, meant for handicapped customers. The staff was either not listening, or (later) just said they don't have the keys. They don't have the keys?? Really?? Horrible. And this was on Jesus Christ's birthday. Irony.

Wheelchair accessibility: They have a washroom for customers using wheelchairs, but they don't allow those to be used.

Very good McDonald’s. Super busy but super fast service. American McDonald’s what can I say.  They didn’t have the mcflurrry I wanted and the change machine ate my money. No clear instructions how to use.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

Recommended dishes
Sausage

The Best McDonald’s in Manhattan, free public toilet with no password. Plenty of spaces to sit and quite fast
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

Recommended dishes
Big Mac and Fries, Nuggets

Super busy after midnight on New Year's. Staff did great job managing the crowd, and the food was hot and up to standard. That said, they had no time to clean ... garbage cans were overflowing. Then, a minor fight broke out between drunk revellers.

I'm sure the atmosphere is much better on most other days, but hey, that's New York on New Year's.

Almost next door to the world trade center and Oculus. If you want to grab something to eat quickly and save time for visiting more places, this is the go-to place unless you want to try the food trucks along the street. That being said, there's always a long line. Highly recommend getting the app and order from there to save some time and skip the line.

Parking: Very hard to find parking

Kid-friendliness: There's a menu for kids

Too many tourists, wanna stop here and eat. And majority of them don’t even know how to speak English. The service really sucks, I don’t think they could read either. I asked for no salt on my fries, and the whole thing was completely salty. The chicken sandwich was bland, and greasy. I really don’t understand how people can give this place 5 stars. They probably friends of the owners or manager

I always check out McDonald's when I visit other countries. Went to the one in Times Square in New York. Their breakfast Griddles were amazing. The restaurant was clean and the service was quick. Some very nice things on the menu to check out. Recommended.
Food: 4/5  |  Service: 4/5  |  Atmosphere: 3/5

Recommended dishes
Big Breakfast with Hotcakes

McDonald's has self-serve kiosks.  I think the ordering process is better than before.  I still have to ask the staff to give me the order.  They just stand behind the counter but not sure what they are doing.

Just look at the photos and decide what kind of store it is.  Off course, customers are also not trying to keep the store clean, but it seems the store too hasn't tried anything.
Food: 4/5  |  Service: 1/5  |  Atmosphere: 1/5

Apparently a cheeseburger with mayo only is too difficult to grasp. All I get is a container of Mayo when I ordered a burger. This is the second time. I thought my Uber esta driver ate my food the first time. I work overnight and my options are limited.
Food: 1/5  |  Service: 1/5

The won't take your order at the register and make you use the kiosk. Which Normally isn't a problem if you are ok with not customizing your order.

I wanted to order a meal but wanted to sub the soda for a smoothie.  In order to do this I had to do everything as an individual item, which cost me more than it would have had they assisted me at the register.
Which if may add I had to stay online and wait almost 15 minutes before, they told me and other customers that they were not taking orders at the register.

Good place to order and eat. Tasty burgers and fries.Plenty of self kiosks, fast service, cool frozen Fanta. open 24 hours!
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 4/5  |  Atmosphere: 4/5

Not sure why I haven't reviewed this location before! Visited there many times. On of the decent mcds out there in the city. Service is good, food is good, and the environment is good. They're just enough. Nothing more, nothing less. Always busy. A good place to take some food if you're in a rush or just for fun. Enjoy!
Food: 4/5  |  Service: 4/5  |  Atmosphere: 4/5

Very clean and organized. I like it made me feel comfortable. The staff are very nice and polite do there job very well. The staff are fast and know how to keep the line short. You order in one side and pick up in the other side. They have seating available. In the first floor you can sit or go up the stairs to more seating and the bathrooms. Didn't go in the bathroom's but I know they have bathrooms. This is one of the best McDonald's I ever been into. I will be coming back here.

Amazing experience overall. I'm from Pakistan and here for on a Visit Visa and I'm glad that I'm lucky enough to try this amazing and beautiful place and food.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

Recommended dishes
Mcchicken, Nuggets, Chicken Biscuit, Hot Fudge Sundae, World Famous Fries, Happy Meal

The staff is very rude and talk rather thsnbdlokg their jobs. Management doesn't seem to care and is very unprofessional. People order in apps and still nothing. Staff laughing and not paying attention to what needs to be done. Mostly Spanish workers who are very rude and not polite. Nice place but the staff needs proper training including management

I bought a tea today March 13,2023 at 7am and I asked for cream on the side. When I poured the creamer in the tea was expired. Please see attached photo.

I also bought food. 2 3$ bundles and everything was cold. I tried calling and no one picked up the phone.

This is a no-location specific review. I just want to give a shout-out to what I think is the world's most consistent restaurant. It's not amazing. It doesn't take your tastebuds to another galaxy. But it deserves top score. Because you know what? They always deliver.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

Sandwiches taste better on floor 102. King Kong is even more fun
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

Recommended dishes

medium-sized Mickey Ds—two floors. however the last time I was there, no indoor dining just takeout and delivery. the interior is brightly let, fairly clean…depending on the time of time.

used the McDonalds app to order before i got to the location so my food would be ready on pickup. to my satisfaction, my order was ready upon arrival. the fries were glorious—piping hot, salty, and crunchy. everything was well-packed and bagged neatly.

staff were fast and efficient.
Staff is disrespectful but the food is great . They get busy it's understandable but if the bathroom are locked of course there's gonna be some to ask access to the ones with keys

I had a craving for a morning muffin and a hash brown... I didn't realize hash browns are going for like $2.20 each now, I haven't stopped at a McD so long, I was just shocked, last time I went to one it was $1.20 or something....

Either way, its a nice place for a quick grub. The place is clean and well kept for a busier McD in the city. Prices well, it'll just keep soring... I still recall getting a big'n'tasty for a dollar back then~

Times fly by so fast…

The staff needs customer service training. They have too many staff for it to be slow. They are unorganized. The screen to tell you status of your order doesn’t work. They don’t have the courtesy to tell customers it doesn’t work. The majority of people are using the kiosk. They need a better flow. Go to Chick-fli-A and see how they control the flow of customers!!

Famous McDonald's on Broadway. Open 24. Was better before the cold weather hit.

Edit: no more free wifi. I had to use the Downtown Alliance wifi. The bathrooms and seating upstairs is closed.
Food: 1/5  |  Service: 1/5  |  Atmosphere: 1/5

Recommended dishes
Big Mac and Fries, Nuggets, Large Fries, Hamburger, French Fries

Order took longer than usual, and was missing a McChicken the first time.  Had to wait a long time after that to get another one.

Picture shows how beautifully it was made.

I was also given few napkins, and had to ask an employee for more.

There was a couple of homeless people that wandered in the restaurant that made me leave early.

Would give 0 stars if I could.

This McDonald's is pretty clean and not sketchy compared to a lot in the city.

However the entire time we were here, they had SiriusXM on, but hadn't paid for SiriusXM. So instead it was just nonstop ads for SiriusXM at a fairly loud volume.

Seriously, it was SiriusXM ads on loop for the 15 minutes we were there.

To be clear, there was no music. Just ads for SiriusXM.

I guess technically some of the ads for SiriusXM had music in the background but I wouldn't call in music in the traditional sense.

Did you know that Charles Barkley and Tom Brady both are in ads for SiriusXM?

Probably the worst McDonald’s I’ve ever been to, the only reason I go back is bc it’s close to my apt, it takes about 25 min to get your food, even though it’s complete, they just let it sit there for someone reason, and if you ask for the order number they give you attitude and hold it for longer. Literally go any where else and you will have better service

Came here a couple times with parents and whenever I get my order, they either don’t give napkins or 1-2 pcs of napkins. How are you supposed to eat a meal with little to no napkins? Had to grab napkins myself. Order always takes a while to get. Also you will have random people (strangers) talking to you or getting your attention with their phone. Can’t even enjoy a meal in peace.

Unfriendly spanish-speaking staff laughed at our faces when requesting to give us some fresh french fries. The oil was old, which was used to cook our french fries and looked accordingly. No respect at all and no hygiene at all from staff.
Food: 1/5  |  Service: 1/5  |  Atmosphere: 1/5

I have waited only 5 mins for my order. But tables was dirty.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

After ordered, just request for add some hot water in my bottle, and they said I shall pay for it?!, I never heard this request in other Mcdonald or Starbucks! you love money so much like this?? huh??
Service is almost always slow.  Morning manager spends majority of her time on the cell phone while customers wait patiently.

the service is not good! They are too slow, i waited for 30 min for my order, food was cold and french fries wasn't fresh, i think oil was old too.
Food: 2/5  |  Service: 1/5  |  Atmosphere: 4/5

80s pop music and exceptionally clean throughout
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

Recommended dishes
Big Mac and Fries

The food was good but you are not allowed to eat inside. By the way the personnel was really nice and attentive.

I had to eat on a bench across the street.

Anytime I am in this area I always eat in this McDonald's. Always clean and the staff very welcoming. Stopped in for breakfast before I went to the Mall.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

We arrived at very busy time
But our food was served fast.
Food: 4/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 3/5

It’s a McDonald’s and it has the typical McDonalds menu. Same motif etc. but this one is special. A couple of homeless people open the door for u without asking for a dime. Very polite people. Not the usual. And this McDonald’s is spotless. I don’t know if they are paid extra but these employees keep this place clean. Cleanest McDonalds I’ve ever been in. The wait time isn’t bad either. I would have given them 4 stars if they offered a vegetarian dish. #sankofatafari #kingofcoffeenyc #mcdonalds #nyc #broadway

Worse place ever. I waited for my order 😩 😫.  No one give it to me . When I asked what happened to my food, no one pays me no mind. So I ask for money back. The manager gave me an attitude.  This is no way to behave towards a customer

This is one of my go to breakfast spots since I work in the wall street area. They have a breakfast bundle for $3 which is what I usually get. It comes with your choice if a sausage biscuit or chicken biscuit and a hash brown for $3. You cannot eat inside but Zuccotti Park is right across th street and Offers a nice lighted trees and Christmas trees scenery while you eat. You can use the bathroom Inside and it's usually clean.

I walk in saw josh James doing 69 with ms brownie sance and they were getting hyped up and I got a bonner opps and then ms berry saw it and set a nuked and many people died
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

So, first of all the big Mac mean doesn’t worth it the 10+ dollars, the portion is so little, quality is knowing among the people, but with the same bunch of money I could have eaten 2 big meals from different places, it’s nothing than a world wide brand, but my advice you don’t-need to try McDonald from the usa if you are a tourist, there is no difference than your country wherever you are...

Extremely dirty: floor, kitchen and tables. The food unsurprisingly tates like plastic and has been laying around here for some time. Staff don't understand a word of English and got the order wrong on multiple occasions.

Very busy location but employees were doing a great job. Clean for a high traffic location. Air conditioning works.
Food: 3/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

Vary helpful, nice, and clean. I will definitely go again.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

I just drank the grimace shake. Weird stuff Was coming out of my Butt and my mouth. But the Problem was solved. Pretty good! Happy birthday grima----
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

The store was really busy so felt a bit chaotic but the service was fairly quickly considering. The dining area is as clean as it gets.
Food: 4/5  |  Service: 4/5  |  Atmosphere: 3/5

Wordt MC donalds ever! This guy thats calls himself a manager tried to curse me in front of me for requesting nuggets that I paid for, but where not in the to go bag! But they didn’t count I can also speak Spanish, extremely uncomfortable situation, I love NY and come here at least 2 a year, me and all the people I can advise will never go to this place again! Disrespectful ppl work here.

Not enough space for people to sit and eat at the restaurant and this is in Manhattan so you know this gon be crowded but other than that the food is good and everyone was kind and respectful
Food: 4/5  |  Service: 4/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

Recommended dishes
Big Mac and Fries

Go early place gets crowded and dirty in late afternoons. Ordering from kiosk still have long wait. My order was wrong twice and staff goes into " I don't speak English". Manager gets annoyed when it's McD error and does not help . Mobile order is faster
Food: 3/5  |  Service: 1/5  |  Atmosphere: 3/5
Worst iced coffee ever we ordered french vanilla but they gave us mocha and its totally like water 🤮 and also worst mc spicey burger ewe 🤮

Very convenient location, area looks safe. The staff is friendly and fast. The restaurant is open 24 hours a day. The fries were very fresh and my Big Mac was perfect. There are some downsides: it's always very crowded and they don't take cash when paying.

Update: same game with half-filled fries and soda.  Kind of ridiculous that they do this to everyone and get away with it.

Don't expect what you pay for...they are the cheapest McDonald's I've ever been to.  They hide away the salt, ketchup, NAPKINS, and everything but the straws.  You have to go to the counter and ask if you want more than one napkin with your meal. Ugh.  Oh, and don't ever expect your fries to act ually be the size you ordered. They half fill them (at best) every single time.  Look out for the "DJ" spinning the same 4 songs and horrible tag line over and over too.

Update: they consistently half fill the fries.  Even after saying something a few times, months later the same.  Added a pic this time too.
THE WORKERS HERE ARE ALWAYS VERY NICE, THE AREA IS SUPER KOOL, IF YOU JUST GIVE IT A CHANCE WALK AROUND,  THE STORE ASSOCIATE  IN MC DONALDS  ARE VERY NICE AND UNDERSTANDING  THANKS GUYS

The service was not good, they missed something off everyone's order including mine, it's not rocket science read what's on the ticket!!! An I work in the food industry too.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 1/5  |  Atmosphere: 1/5

Recommended dishes

What this place needs is a ZERO rating. Dining is filthy. Looks like no one working here knows what food hygiene is all about. The lady in the kitchen was seen touching her hair while preparing the food. Placed my order at 0306hrs and was only given my order at 0328hrs. And there was only one customer ahead of me! 3 staff manning the food preparation, looking like they're working hard, but, when in reality they're barely working. A big disappointment! The only menu available for ordering is nuggets. And what do I get is cold nuggets despite waiting for 20 mins. Avoid this place, folks!

what can we say about this place? it's kinda like what it was when you were a kid but different. I used to work at one when I was 15 and we actually cooked on a grill to order. no more. they precook things and keep them warm in trays. the only 'fresh' thing are the fries, and I order them without salt to ensure the freshness. they also now have a rewards program that allows to redeem for for but you're only allowed 1 item per purchase. you'll have to wait at least 15 minutes to place another order to redeem. gimmicky to make you stay in the restaurant too purchase more, in my opinion. either way, they managed to keep the same tastes fun your childhood but eliminated the restaurant aspect of it and reduced it to heated up precooked food. enjoy

i just ordered a oreo frappe august 3rd, 2023 and asked to remake it because it had pieces of plastic inside, they gave me a new one but still had many little pieces
Recommended dishes
This Mackydees is always super busy 24/7 365 with tourists. But service is fast and you can usually get a seat upstairs. The DJ spinning tunes is a nice addition,pretty unique!
You can't order/pay at the register. You have to use the self-service machine. I got my card hacked here suddenly was getting billed for grubhub, seamless orders of $50+ each.

It's a good place to eat in Downtown. The advantage is that they're open 24h. There are many options and the service is good too. For hot drinks don't forget to ask for sugar or sweetener before leaving, cause, they use to not give if you don't ask for it.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

I am so amazed on how this McDonald's have changed and not for the good I think it's worst. Along time ago I mean before 911 this McDonald's felt like a 5 star restaurant I mean the first time i entered there was a man above u playing a piano. Well the food was the same but it felt different going in. Now it's just totally different. It even smells bad inside. Totally Shocked.
Friendly and helpful staff. It took no time to prepare my hamburger 😊. And I enjoyed it. The medium coffee was delicious and hot, the way I liked it 👍
Reopening!!! Went there around 3pm, it was super crowded.

A crazy busy place that gets my coffee order wrong often. I've learned to always check it before leaving the store.
Food: 4/5  |  Service: 3/5  |  Atmosphere: 3/5

Recommended dishes

It's a nice McDonald's with a lot of space (2 floors) and restrooms. They decorate it seasonally, even though it's not necessary it adds solid aestetics to the restaurant. The food is mostly warm but the fries are not fresh sometimes (just like other McDonald's, nothing new). The staff are pretty friendly and it's a quick grab & go McDonald's.

The ladies in the staff are very rude  but all the men staff are very nice and polite. All the porters and generators who are Spanish are polite and helpful too but not the ladies on the cash register or serving orders. You will have to face other problems like baring homeless people and saying no to beggars and unexpected random behaviour from wierd customers they have.

Kid-friendliness: Happy meal is a good option
6 A.M. Love the 2 for $4 deal. love the sausage it's little spicy.  But don't like it when block the passage way and had to walk on the wet floor

One OF The Best McDonald’s
I’m Loving IT 🍔
A year ago left 1 star because there were no self-checkout screens. This year walked in and I see the screens. Giving 5 stars for that
Arrived late night hoping to get a meal only to be told that they closed early and were preparing for breakfast smh

Well-organized McDonalds with people to guide you to the shortest line and two people bringing out orders from the kitchen during peak times, and a well-stocked kitchen. There is even significantly more seating than some other McDonalds locations.

That said, you will be much happier if you go earlier or later than the usual lunch time, because you WILL be waiting a while for even a simple order of one hamburger, and you may find that all the seats are taken. Pictures attached here were taken mid day on a Friday to give you an idea of what it's like to come during the peak lunch hour.

You are also going to pay Manhattan prices, which are quite a bit higher than suburban McDonalds prices, but in this neighborhood a $10 meal of a BigMac, fries and a drink is competitive with many of the nearby alternatives, especially those that have a decent place to sit and eat your food.

Great service inspite being busy at the heart if financial district
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

This may sound strange but this is by far the best McDonald's I've been to in a long time. The staff is friendly & very fast and the food is always cooked perfectly. Never cold, dried out etc. The dining area is also large & clean. As far as fast food goes this is a good spot in a sea of horrible options. And who doesn't need a quick McDonald's breakfast, coffee or mid-afternoon snack when visiting or doing business in the Wall Street area.

It is constantly busy due to being close to tower and ponds, great place to grab and go or just sit after being outside and rest as you eat.
Food: 4/5  |  Service: 4/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

This has to be one of the worst McDonald's I've ever experienced.....
First problem: when I walk in the have a bunch of people at the front of the counter waiting for their food...
Second problem: I ordered a Big Mac with no pickles and a sweet tea....I received a Big Mac with pickles,which I'm allergic to....
Third problem: They had an employee dealing with customers at the front of the establishment who was unable to do the job properly cause he didn't speak English, then his co worker had the nerve to get upset cause the customers didn't understand what was being said to them, cause the employee didn't speak English & the Customers didn't speak Spanish....
This has to be one of the worst McDonald's I've ever experienced..Please save your money,  avoid this McDonald's at all cost...
They need to update their hours on google. They are not open 24/hrs I walked all the way here from my hotel at 5am waste of time and energy

Nice stuff, people who work there are nice, good and polite, coffee is good, thank you?
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5

I like here for fast service and their inexpensive Caramel Mocha that taste delicous compare to expensive Dunkin and Starbucks👌 ....I also love their fries comes in a good second to Wendy's😉....but need improvement on their chicken burgers and sandwiches, also this new spicy glazed chicken strips..NO SPICE AT ALL🙄...taste like burnt barbeque based strips, definitely not appealing😖...improve on these then you will get a 4 star...because no fast food is 5 star

Overall I liked it, but they are missing some security guards there... not to be mean, disrespect or a bad person; but the homeless people kill the vibe, is not very nice eating with someone who stinks and is asking for money next to you
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 2/5
Good dinning experience with comfortable seating and music. Enjoying my chicken selects and fries there. I just wish they got rid of panhandlers and the homeless outside.

Great atmosphere, i went on a Tuesday at 7pm and it didn't seem very crowded. However the second floor dining and seating seemed a bit too warm but aside from that an above average McDonald's experience

The best caramel ice cream I have had.

Totally recommend

Takeout: Yes

Ideally located across the street from a bus stop. You can grab a quick $3 meal and drink and still make your bus! The server is quick and efficient! you're not standing in line other than to place your order. It's small, clean, and guarded. Security is ever present.
Pretty empty during breakfast.  Good and fast service.

This is dead set the worst McDonalds on the planet. Took 45 mins to get two quarter pounders. The staff don’t care and there doesn’t appear to be a manager steering the ship. Bins all overloaded, nobody cleaning the filthy tables. Gross.
I don’t know what their food taste or anything about this place but I sure do know I called there number and after a little while there was an EXTREMELY creepy phone ring, I got scared and hanged up.

Well, it starts, with they must close early. There was no way for us to go inside to get our food. We had to order from the drive-thru window. Not only do we have to order through the drive-thru window. But so did the people that order their food via that app online. I sat at the drive-thru window for about 30 minutes waiting for someone to get back to me which they never did. I drove around the block; two other cars got there. They were there to get their information and I still had to wait to order my food. When I ordered my food I asked for the burger to not have cheese on it, and it did have cheese. It seemed that there were a lot of people waiting in line to order through the drive-thru that had ordered through the app and or came to the drive-thru. This was about 7:00 at night on Tuesday the 4th of 2023 April.

Parking: At night the parking is quite dark the area to park in was very very dark and it seemed a little uncomfortable for people to park.

App ordered, gave me the run around, then they gave my order to someone else. Will be talking to my credit card company.
Food: 1/5  |  Service: 1/5  |  Atmosphere: 1/5

Very dirty location. The smell inside is so bad, you can’t even smell the food

Terrible service. Every employee was busy dancing, recording, on the phone or whatever, anything but working. Every customer had an incorrect order, no employee seemed to care. The employees are all teenagers who are not interested in working. You need an adult or at least a responsible person working here.

Also homeless and junkies have taken over the second floor. I felt terrible for the housekeeper who was busy trying to keep this place clean   .

Find another McDonald's. Anything but this location.
Nice spot to eat burger. The Price Performance Ratio is very good. I like the double quarter pounder best. The Staff was friendly and quick. The restaurant was clean and tidied up.

Stopped in for a quick lunch and had the spicey chicken burger meal. The chicken was questionable, I’ve never had stringy chicken before. Sat in upstairs, plenty of seats and tables, unfortunately not one of them was clean.

Too many homeless people inside the place. I understand their situation, but they make the seats soily and dirty, which makes u just buy and go out

I get my lunch here from time to time, the food is good, the service is nice, the atmosphere could be better.

Hi I just like to say that when I went in for my interview at this McDonald's everybody seemed like they were nice and the manager took my application and tell me she would get back with me I have not heard anything this the only complaint that I have

Its a good location McDonals with two floors. However there are no ordering kiosks so either stand in a long line or order through their app.

The pick up area is very crowded and they have to tell the numbers because the boards are not used. There are free restrooms upstairs.

They disable the most of the apps deals. And also they do not offer refills of the sodas which is very stingy…

Dirty, awful service and cold food. Do I need to write anything else?

The absolute warmest staff that I've encountered in all of McDonalds that I've ever been to. Special shout out to Jessica, Aryana, I forgot to get the cashier's name, and also the lady cleaning the tables. Everyone was smiling and efficient even though it was rush hour. Excellent service. Would definitely come back.

November 1, 2022

RAT BEHIND THE COUNTER

I did not dine in this restaurant because as soon as I walked in & before I made it to the counter to order, people started screaming & running from behind the counter.  Then I see a person with a broom running toward it.  I even heard a worker say, Aren't you going to pick it up?"  A man walking out the restaurant along with me said "that was a big rat."  I think that is disgusting & unsanitary.   I know that could not be the first time they have seen a rat in there.  How can you serve people food with rats with diseases in your restaurant?  I will never eat in there again.  People be aware that this McDonald's is not clean & you can get very ill eating in this place.
